title: Vantage Point
description: Talk me through how he manages to do this to me?We agreed it was a mistake, that it wouldn’t happen again. But it did. And it keeps happening.I am completely dickmatised.I don’t do relationships, this is nothing more than a habit. A habit I can’t break.This woman is under my skin.Her ocean blue eyes transfix me, her body distracts me and her mind excites me.It’s just a game and this is how I play. Except she has the power.She’s my filthy habit - I just need a quick fix.Leilani Barros is THE sports agent. At 29 she owns her own agency. She says who does what and when. At the top of her field, there is nothing beyond her reach. The biggest stars in the game quite literally call her name. Women want to be her, Men want to be in her. Guy is an acquaintance, a friend, a lover. Stepping back from her life something isn’t sitting right. She looks, learns and listens to her heart. Will she sink or swim?Guy Pearce Morgan is an ambitious young lawyer. He is a partner in one of the largest law firms in London. His surname is the most coveted thing in London. The ultimate bachelor, his father thinks he is a business deal and wants him to marry up the ladder. Guy would rather be a snake, especially when it comes to his fathers choice of woman.When things start to go wrong in both their lives, it all gets complicated, decisions are made but will breaking the habit of a lifetime protect or destroy them?Vantage Point“A place or position affording a good view of something”
author: Georgia Hamilton
